fw.name: ProductStructureInterfaces
fw.footer: Copyright © 1999-2011, Dassault Systèmes. All rights reserved.

class.name: Analyze
class.abstract: Represents the analysis object associated with a product.

method.name: GetGravityCenter
method.abstract: Returns the gravity center coordinates of product.

method.name: GetInertia
method.abstract: Returns the inertia matrix array of product.

method.name: Mass
method.abstract: Returns the product mass value.

method.name: Volume
method.abstract: Returns the product volume value.

method.name: WetArea
method.abstract: Returns the product wet area (outer volume).

method.name: Print
method.abstract: Extracts the product's contents as a specified format.

method.name: SetCurrentFormat
method.abstract: Defines the properties that will be used in the print method.

method.name: SetSecondaryFormat
method.abstract: Defines the secondary properties that will be used in the print method.

method.name: ActivateDefaultShape
method.abstract: Activate default shape.

method.name: ActivateShape
method.abstract: Activate one shape.

method.name: AddMasterShapeRepresentation
method.abstract: Adds the master shape representation to the product.

method.name: AddShapeRepresentation
method.abstract: Adds a representation to the product with a specific behavior.

method.name: ApplyWorkMode
method.abstract: Applies a new working mode.

method.name: Connections
method.abstract: Returns the product's constraints.

method.name: CreateReferenceFromName
method.abstract: Creates a reference from a name.

method.name: DesactivateDefaultShape
method.abstract: Deactivate default shape.

method.name: DesactivateShape
method.abstract: Deactivate one shape.

method.name: ExtractBOM
method.abstract: Extracts the product's contents as a bill of materials (BOM).

method.name: GetActiveShapeName
method.abstract: Returns the name of the active shape.

method.name: GetAllShapesNames
method.abstract: List the name of all shapes.

method.name: GetDefaultShapeName
method.abstract: Returns the default shape.

method.name: GetMasterShapeRepresentation
method.abstract: Retrieves the product's master shape representation.

method.name: GetMasterShapeRepresentationPathName
method.abstract: Retrieves the product's master shape representation pathname.

method.name: GetShapePathName
method.abstract: Returns the path name of a shape for a given shape name.

method.name: GetShapeRepresentation
method.abstract: Retrieves the product's representation with the given parameters.

method.name: GetTechnologicalObject
method.abstract: Returns the product's applicative data which type is the given parameter.

method.name: HasAMasterShapeRepresentation
method.abstract: Returns whether the product has a master shape representation.

method.name: HasShapeRepresentation
method.abstract: Returns whether the product has a representation of the given name with a given behavior.

method.name: RemoveMasterShapeRepresentation
method.abstract: Removes the master shape representation from the product.

method.name: RemoveShapeRepresentation
method.abstract: Removes a specific representation from the product.

method.name: Update
method.abstract: Updates the product.

method.name: Analyze
method.abstract: Returns the Analyze object associated to the current product.

method.name: Definition
method.abstract: Returns or sets the product's definition.

method.name: DescriptionInst
method.abstract: Returns or sets the product's description for a component product.

method.name: DescriptionRef
method.abstract: Returns or sets the product's description for a reference product.

method.name: Move
method.abstract: Returns the product's move object.

method.name: Nomenclature
method.abstract: Returns or sets the product's nomenclature.

method.name: Parameters
method.abstract: Returns the collection object containing the product parameters.

method.name: PartNumber
method.abstract: Returns or sets the product's part number.

method.name: Position
method.abstract: Returns the product's position object.

method.name: Products
method.abstract: Returns the collection of products contained in the current product.

method.name: Publications
method.abstract: Returns the collection of publications managed by the product.

method.name: ReferenceProduct
method.abstract: Returns the Reference Product of this instance.

method.name: Relations
method.abstract: Returns the collection object containing the product relations.

method.name: Revision
method.abstract: Returns or sets the product's revision number.

method.name: Source
method.abstract: Returns or sets the product's source.

method.name: UserRefProperties
method.abstract: Returns the collection object containing the product properties.

class.name: ProductDocument
class.abstract: Represents the Document object for product structures.

method.name: Product
method.abstract: Returns the root product.

class.name: Products
class.abstract: The collection of the Product objects contained in a given Product object of a ProductDocument object.

method.name: AddComponent
method.abstract: Creates a component and adds it to the Products collection.

method.name: AddComponentsFromFiles
method.abstract: Creates a component for each file.

method.name: AddExternalComponent
method.abstract: Creates a component from the root product of another ProductDocument object.

method.name: AddNewComponent
method.abstract: Creates a component from the root product of a new ProductDocument object.

method.name: AddNewProduct
method.abstract: Creates a Product reference object.

method.name: Item
method.abstract: Returns a product from its index in the Products collection.

method.name: Remove
method.abstract: Removes a product from the Products collection.

method.name: ReplaceComponent
method.abstract: Creates a component which replace the given one.

method.name: ReplaceProduct
method.abstract: Creates a component which replace the given one.

class.name: Publication
class.abstract: The interface to access a CATIAPublication.

method.name: Relay
method.abstract: Valuates a publication object with another publication object.

method.name: Valuation
method.abstract: Returns published object.

class.name: Publications
class.abstract: The collection of the Product publications.

method.name: Add
method.abstract: Adds a publication object to the product and returns a pointer to the publication object.

method.name: Item
method.abstract: Returns the publication object corresponding to the given publication name.

method.name: Remove
method.abstract: Removes a publication from the product.

method.name: SetDirect
method.abstract: Valuates a publication object directly with the object it publishes.

method.name: SetRelay
method.abstract: Valuates a publication object with another publication object.
